channel.title: Compile Error in NPC Handler
channel.description:
Ok so I was just changing some stuff around in NPC Handler and then when I go to compile, I get 1 error.
[code]NPCHandler.java:1267 illeagal start of expression public boolean IsDropping = false; ^[/code]
And the really weird thing is that I was never even even near that area in NPCHandler...So does anyone have any idea of how to fix it?

item.title: Compile Error in NPC Handler
item.dc:creator: @Sandy_Man Sandy Man
item.description:
@Sandy_Man wrote:

k thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Error in NPC Handler
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

I think that means you should remove the most recent code you added because you missed a } somewhere, and seeing as you only have one error from it it is near the end of the class, to find the error go in your npc hander and find public boolean IsDropping = false; and above it alittle you should find something you recently edited or added, and you messed up with it

Read full topic
